channel.title: Help with adding custom npc
channel.description:
this was the tut i used http://www.rune-server .org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/288586-pi-making-custom-npcs-pi.html my code if(i == 189) { stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[630]; entityDef.aByte68 = 3; entityDef.readValues(stream); // Collect original NPC data entityDef.actions = new String[5]; entityDef.actions[1] = "Attack"; int changedColors = 1; // Number of model colors changed on the NPC entityDef.originalModelColors = new int[changedColors]; entityDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[changedColors]; entityDef.originalModelColors[0] = 40; // Original model color entityDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 34; // Changed model color entityDef.models = new int[9]; entityDef.models[0] = 9638;//cape entityDef.models[1] = 205;//head 235 entityDef.models[2] = 40207;//plate entityDef.models[3] = 5024;//legs entityDef.models[4] = 43660;// D Claws entityDef.models[5] = 13319;//gloves 13307 entityDef.models[6] = 10683;//boots 10683 entityDef.models[7] = 17461;//darkness entityDef.models[8] = 20147;//arms entityDef.standAnim = 6001; entityDef.name = "NationScape's Warrior"; entityDef.combatLevel = 175; entityDef.description = "A very powerful Warrior!".getBytes(); } and my error
EntityDef.java:74: error: non-static variable aByte68 cannot be referenced from a static context EntityDef.aByte68 = 3; ^ EntityDef.java:75: error: non-static method readValues(Stream) cannot be referen ced from a static context EntityDef.readValues(stream); // Collect original NPC data ^ EntityDef.java:76: error: cannot find symbol EntityDef.actions = new String[5]; ^ symbol: variable actions location: class EntityDef EntityDef.java:77: error: cannot find symbol EntityDef.actions[1] = "Attack"; ^ symbol: variable actions location: class EntityDef EntityDef.java:79: error: cannot find symbol EntityDef.originalModelColors = new int[changedColors]; ^ symbol: variable originalModelColors location: class EntityDef EntityDef.java:80: error: cannot find symbol EntityDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[changedColors]; ^ symbol: variable modifiedModelColors location: class EntityDef EntityDef.java:81: error: cannot find symbol EntityDef.originalModelColors[0] = 40; // Original model color ^ symbol: variable originalModelColors location: class EntityDef EntityDef.java:82: error: cannot find symbol EntityDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 34; // Changed model color ^ symbol: variable modifiedModelColors location: class EntityDef EntityDef.java:83: error: cannot find symbol EntityDef.models = new int[9]; ^ symbol: variable models location: class EntityDef EntityDef.java:84: error: cannot find symbol EntityDef.models[0] = 9638;//cape ^ symbol: variable models location: class EntityDef EntityDef.java:85: error: cannot find symbol EntityDef.models[1] = 205;//head 235 ^ symbol: variable models location: class EntityDef EntityDef.java:86: error: cannot find symbol EntityDef.models[2] = 40207;//plate ^ symbol: variable models location: class EntityDef EntityDef.java:87: error: cannot find symbol EntityDef.models[3] = 5024;//legs ^ symbol: variable models location: class EntityDef EntityDef.java:88: error: cannot find symbol EntityDef.models[4] = 43660;// D Claws ^ symbol: variable models location: class EntityDef EntityDef.java:89: error: cannot find symbol EntityDef.models[5] = 13319;//gloves 13307 ^ symbol: variable models location: class EntityDef EntityDef.java:90: error: cannot find symbol EntityDef.models[6] = 10683;//boots 10683 ^ symbol: variable models location: class EntityDef EntityDef.java:91: error: cannot find symbol EntityDef.models[7] = 17461;//darkness ^ symbol: variable models location: class EntityDef EntityDef.java:92: error: cannot find symbol EntityDef.models[8] = 20147;//arms ^ symbol: variable models location: class EntityDef EntityDef.java:93: error: cannot find symbol EntityDef.standAnim = 6001; ^ symbol: variable standAnim location: class EntityDef EntityDef.java:94: error: non-static variable name cannot be referenced from a s tatic context EntityDef.name = "NationScape's Warrior"; ^ EntityDef.java:95: error: non-static variable combatLevel cannot be referenced f rom a static context EntityDef.combatLevel = 175; ^ EntityDef.java:96: error: non-static variable description cannot be referenced f rom a static context EntityDef.description = "A very powerful Warrior!".getBytes(); ^ Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 22 errors Press any key to continue . . . please help thank you ill rep

item.title: Help with adding custom npc
item.dc:creator: @getsuga121 getsuga121
item.description:
@getsuga121 wrote:

this was the tut i used
http://www.rune-server .org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/288586-pi-making-custom-npcs-pi.html
my code
if(i == 189) {
stream.currentOffset = streamIndices[630];
entityDef.aByte68 = 3;
entityDef.readValues(stream); // Collect original NPC data
entityDef.actions = new String[5];
entityDef.actions[1] = “Attack”;
int changedColors = 1; // Number of model colors changed on the NPC
entityDef.originalModelColors = new int[changedColors];
entityDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[changedColors];
entityDef.originalModelColors[0] = 40; // Original model color
entityDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 34; // Changed model color
entityDef.models = new int[9];
entityDef.models[0] = 9638;//cape
entityDef.models[1] = 205;//head 235
entityDef.models[2] = 40207;//plate
entityDef.models[3] = 5024;//legs
entityDef.models[4] = 43660;// D Claws
entityDef.models[5] = 13319;//gloves 13307
entityDef.models[6] = 10683;//boots 10683
entityDef.models[7] = 17461;//darkness
entityDef.models[8] = 20147;//arms
entityDef.standAnim = 6001;
entityDef.name = “NationScape’s Warrior”;
entityDef.combatLevel = 175;
entityDef.description = “A very powerful Warrior!”.getBytes();
}
and my error

EntityDef.java:74: error: non-static variable aByte68 cannot be referenced from
a static context
EntityDef.aByte68 = 3;
^
EntityDef.java:75: error: non-static method readValues(Stream) cannot be referen
ced from a static context
EntityDef.readValues(stream); // Collect original NPC data
^
EntityDef.java:76: error: cannot find symbol
EntityDef.actions = new String[5];
^
symbol: variable actions
location: class EntityDef
EntityDef.java:77: error: cannot find symbol
EntityDef.actions[1] = “Attack”;
^
symbol: variable actions
location: class EntityDef
EntityDef.java:79: error: cannot find symbol
EntityDef.originalModelColors = new int[changedColors];
^
symbol: variable originalModelColors
location: class EntityDef
EntityDef.java:80: error: cannot find symbol
EntityDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[changedColors];
^
symbol: variable modifiedModelColors
location: class EntityDef
EntityDef.java:81: error: cannot find symbol
EntityDef.originalModelColors[0] = 40; // Original model color
^
symbol: variable originalModelColors
location: class EntityDef
EntityDef.java:82: error: cannot find symbol
EntityDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 34; // Changed model color
^
symbol: variable modifiedModelColors
location: class EntityDef
EntityDef.java:83: error: cannot find symbol
EntityDef.models = new int[9];
^
symbol: variable models
location: class EntityDef
EntityDef.java:84: error: cannot find symbol
EntityDef.models[0] = 9638;//cape
^
symbol: variable models
location: class EntityDef
EntityDef.java:85: error: cannot find symbol
EntityDef.models[1] = 205;//head 235
^
symbol: variable models
location: class EntityDef
EntityDef.java:86: error: cannot find symbol
EntityDef.models[2] = 40207;//plate
^
symbol: variable models
location: class EntityDef
EntityDef.java:87: error: cannot find symbol
EntityDef.models[3] = 5024;//legs
^
symbol: variable models
location: class EntityDef
EntityDef.java:88: error: cannot find symbol
EntityDef.models[4] = 43660;// D Claws
^
symbol: variable models
location: class EntityDef
EntityDef.java:89: error: cannot find symbol
EntityDef.models[5] = 13319;//gloves 13307
^
symbol: variable models
location: class EntityDef
EntityDef.java:90: error: cannot find symbol
EntityDef.models[6] = 10683;//boots 10683
^
symbol: variable models
location: class EntityDef
EntityDef.java:91: error: cannot find symbol
EntityDef.models[7] = 17461;//darkness
^
symbol: variable models
location: class EntityDef
EntityDef.java:92: error: cannot find symbol
EntityDef.models[8] = 20147;//arms
^
symbol: variable models
location: class EntityDef
EntityDef.java:93: error: cannot find symbol
EntityDef.standAnim = 6001;
^
symbol: variable standAnim
location: class EntityDef
EntityDef.java:94: error: non-static variable name cannot be referenced from a s
tatic context
EntityDef.name = “NationScape’s Warrior”;
^
EntityDef.java:95: error: non-static variable combatLevel cannot be referenced f
rom a static context
EntityDef.combatLevel = 175;
^
EntityDef.java:96: error: non-static variable description cannot be referenced f
rom a static context
EntityDef.description = “A very powerful Warrior!”.getBytes();
^
Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
22 errors
Press any key to continue . . .
please help thank you ill rep
